column1: # The TSV should not have a header and should have exactly three columns:
# id to match existing metadata, field name, and field value
# If there are multiple annotations for the same id and field, then the last value is used
# Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments
# Any '#' after the field value are treated as comments.
# These are proposed to be left as Germany to show local transmission

column3: Germany # Alzey strain, described in https://journals.asm.org/doi/full/10.1128/genomea.00938-16 (L seg)
Germany # Acquired by funeral worker, but decreased was evacuated from Togo.(S Seg)
